plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Some bunnies love to munch on me!
🥗 I'm often in a salad.
🥬 I'm a leafy green vegetable.

plant.question: I have a stem and a colorful head. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I grow in gardens and fields.
🌷 I'm often given as a gift.
💐 I can be many different colors, like red, yellow, or purple.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and I am long and green. I make a tasty pickle. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can slice me and put me on a sandwich.
🥒 I am a type of vegetable.
💧 I need lots of water to grow big.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🪵 You can make paper from me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a tree and I am red and juicy. Sometimes I am in pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate one!
🐛 Sometimes you find a worm in me.
🥧 People make a delicious dessert out of me.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful flowers. People grow me in gardens, but be careful of my spikes! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a symbol of love.
🥀 I have a very fragrant smell.
📌 Ouch! Be careful not to get pricked!

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a husk. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I grow tall in fields.
🌽 Animals love to eat me!
🍿 You can make a yummy snack from me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tropical tree.
🥥 I have water inside.
🏖️ You might find me on a beach.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny likes to eat me all the time!
👁️ I am good for your eyes.
🌱 Part of me grows under the dirt.

plant.question: I am a root that is brown and sweet. You can mash me and eat me as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I am orange inside.
🥧 I am a popular pie ingredient in the fall.
🍠 I am related to the potato.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I have lots of water!
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🌊 You can find sand next to me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very, very slow.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
💧 I can squeeze into small spaces.
🎨 I can change colors.

ocean.question: I'm a very big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🦷 My teeth are very pointy.
🏊 I swim very fast.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have bright colors.
🏠 I live in a coral home.
🐠 Other fish like to be near me.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I communicate by singing.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.

ocean.question: I'm a sea animal with a flat body and a long tail that stings if you get too close. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦹 I can be dangerous
〰️ I swim in a wavy way.
🖐️ Don't touch my tail!

ocean.question: I'm a creature that lives in the ocean and looks like a plant but is actually an animal. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I look like seaweed.
🧱 I can build big reefs.
🏘️ Many fish live in my home.

ocean.question: I'm a small, shiny object hidden in some sea creatures. People like to find me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I am often round.
✨ I am very pretty.
🦪 I can be found inside an oyster.

ocean.question: I am a very large, icy object floating in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen water.
🏔️ Only a small part of me is above water.
🥶 I am very cold.
